item.title: ::help command 317
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

try this…

if(command.startsWith("help") && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) {
        modYell("@blu@["+playerName+"]@bla@Needs moderator assistance!");
        actionInterval = 30000;
        lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
} else {
        sM("You need to wait 30 seconds to yell for help again");
}

Mod yell ftw.
modYell

Incase you dont have modYell

	public void modYell(String msg) {
		for (Player element : handler.players) {
			client p = (client) element;
			if ((p != null) && !p.disconnected && (p.absX > 0) && (p.playerRights > 0)) {
				p.sM(msg);
			}
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: ::help command 317
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

Ok, this is my command:

if(command.startsWith("help") && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { yell("@blu@["+playerName+"]@bla@Needs moderator assistance!"); actionInterval = 30000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { sM("You need to wait 30 seconds to yell for help again"); }

How can I make it to send messages only to mods+?

Read full topic
